title: Introduction to C Programming
description: C program is a set of instructions written in the C programming language, used for software development, ranging from simple calculations to complex applications.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: An algorithms program is a set of logical instructions designed to solve specific computational problems efficiently, fundamental in computer science and software development.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: C++ is a software application written in the C++ Language, allowing object-oriented programming and featuring extensive libraries for versatile development tasks.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Basic data structures are fundamental components in computer science, including arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues, used for organizing and managing data in various applications.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python is a programming paradigm emphasizing the creation of reusable and structured code using classes, objects, and inheritance for efficient development.

title: Software Engineering
description: Software engineering is the systematic process of designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software, focusing on reliability and efficient project management for successful applications.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: AWS is a leading cloud computing platform that provides on-demand computing resources, enabling scalable and cost-effective solutions for businesses and developers.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: MySQL is a popular open-source relational database management system (RDBMS) used to store, manage, and retrieve structured data efficiently for various applications.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Problem-solving is a cognitive process of analyzing, evaluating, and finding solutions to challenges or questions, often involving logical reasoning and critical thinking skills.
